message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a slightly better split. Let's seal the deal quickly!

Time is running out, and inflation is eating our money. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
Considering the inflation, 50/50 isn't fair anymore. This is a better compromise

You're losing money fast, I'm being generous here, take it before it's too late
Alice, I'm sticking to my previous offer.  Let's be realistic, the clock is ticking and we both lose if this falls apart.
Bob, you're running out of time and money, this is your last chance to get something worthwhile
